divs: Sighting Detailswe saw a rather large cluster of lights not star like. We went in the house to get the zoom camera and the binoculars. The camera was of no help at all the screen was black... But the binoculars showed a spectacular light show. Flashing colors - red blue green, yellow white in not apparent order. The object changed from the triangular shape to a more spherical shape. My husband noticed it move to the south but after about a half an hour it was moving to the north. We called the CHP to make note of the event and were very soon contacted by a volunteer from the National UFO center Ethan Davenport. He was very polite and suggested that it might be sirius. We will be checking again tomorrow night.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Paso Robles
There were no other sightings in Paso Robles on or around April 27th 2013
Summary: flashing lights various colors not distinct order random flashing
